content:
I continue to have problems with the build, first the build now creates a file c:\temp\sp.txt

This don't work so hot on Unix based systems

This is new since the content freeze for the STU3 realize, can one of the build experts determine why this file is being created and if it is necessary to a functioning build
Grahame had it there for debugging. He's now removed it
Thanks it showed up on my status of changed files, it appears I have some sort of issue with terminology as a bunch of examples (not mine) are failing with missing terminology
yes I increased the checking once R3 was published.

That fixed it for me, thanks Grahame and Lloyd

Build is working as expected
